website_summaries.verdict: From a reliable manufacturer, this heat gun is a shining example of clever design and attention to detail. It delivers the impressive performance levels demanded by professional users.
pros: Heats up rapidly and can achieve 1,100°F
Large, easy-to-use dial and LCD readout let you to set the temperature you need quickly – and there’s built-in overload protection
10 feet of cord, hanging ring, and kickstand are useful, practical additions
cons: It’s expensive and not difficult to find tools with similar specifications and more accessories for less money
A few users experienced switch problems

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Temp
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful heat gun this is. I had a no frills Wagner and it only had 3 settings, high and low. I never knew the temperature so often my shrink wrap didn't shrink up enough or if too hot burn right through it. It also comes with 2 nozzle attachments to assist in your heating needs. This gun allows me to control the temperature up to 1100 degrees. It also lets me know when the gun reaches the correct temperature. It looks quire large, but is really rather light weight. I really enjoy using the heat gun and it keeps things simple and professional. Cheers an Vidimo Se!
customer_reviews.author: Zavi Rasan

customer_reviews.title: Love Dewalt products!
customer_reviews.text: I am already partial to Dewalt products. I thought about going with a cheaper product as Dewalt are generally more expensive than other brands. Overall, I am very satisfied. There are two fan speeds, with independent heat settings. It has pop-outs near the base of the handle to let it securely stand on a workbench or table for hands-free use. Quality is second to none. This is probably the best choice if you are planning to use it frequently and are looking for a long-lasting tool.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S

customer_reviews.title: but it's the best one I've ever used and it gets used many ...
customer_reviews.text: I know it's just a heat gun. A pricey heat gun at that, but it's the best one I've ever used and it gets used many times a day. The digital temp gauge makes sure it's right where you need it for any type of application. Yeah, I'm a girl and I love my power tools. The only thing I would change on this design is the kickstand. It would be much better if it were bigger and on the front guard part of the handle to make it easy to set down safely on any flat surface, but even then I give it 5 stars because I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: dogzrul

customer_reviews.title: Great Heat Gun
customer_reviews.text: I use a heat gun a lot. Have burned up two in the past. This one is the best I've had. You can control temps, it's solid and it works. What else can you say. You want a heat gun that does its job? This one does.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: top of the line heat gun
customer_reviews.text: These are the best heat guns out there. We use different ones at work. I purchased this one for my shop. Because of the ease of use, digital controls, and high heat output. Would buy again if needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: jandachilton

customer_reviews.title: One hard working gun
customer_reviews.text: I tint windows for a living so this gun gets a lot of use. Most heat guns don’t make it past 6 months. It’s a bit more than we wanted to spend on it but it’s proven it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: dw71

customer_reviews.title: Great heat gun if you need one! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality heat gun and easy to use. The LCD display shows you the settings you have it on etc. The gun is easy to handle, you can easily tell the setting it is on with heat levels etc, and there is a stand you can use as well on it. If you want a heat gun I would recommend you get this one especially if you can find it at a price like I did of $79. The DEWALT brand lives up to its name on this one.
customer_reviews.author: bwp_guardian

customer_reviews.title: fire it up!
customer_reviews.text: You just never know when you're going to need a heat gun. I personally picked this one up for work as I've been needing it to do shrink wrapping lately. For the money, this is a good heat gun. Takes a little while to warm up, but once it hits the desired temp. It works solid just as you'd expect from all dewalt products. I just wish it came with a carry case the way my dewalt drill did. Oh well. Small gripe. Great heat gun though with a really nice digital readout.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Very durable and solid feeling gun. I really like the variable heat settings. I've burned out a few of the cheap guns and this one is so nice, I kick myself for wasting my money on anything else. Expensive, but will pay for itself in the long run. Wish they had the delux version available when I bought mine. Pay only $10 extra and get all the attachments plus case!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Sky

customer_reviews.title: A heat gun for many uses.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is great, it was purchased to help with some PVC and it works great! I find that it also is excellent for heat shrink tubing. This would make a good choice for either job. The gun heats up quickly, yet handle remains cool.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Best Heat Gun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the projects we use a heat gun for.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Abt

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact thing that I ordered! This is the basic LCD temp., model without case or 10 other tips, this has a fishtailtip and the reducer. Made sure it works, and will be using very soon....came packed well, external box was a bit large, but came through the UPS system unmarked!
customer_reviews.author: Buzzcutter79

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not DeWalt quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially thought Nothing special - nothing to make it any more expensive than a 40.00 heat gun - t stopped working today completely - 6 weeks ?? Crappy tool - I will stick with the 40.00 ones - they last a year or more
customer_reviews.author: TheBirdBrain

customer_reviews.title: Good DeWalt quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this gun for several years now, and it works very nicely. It comes to temp in less then a minute, and you can set the temperature accurately. On the highest setting it will quite easily melt solder or set things on fire. Handle stays nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: bad on off switch
customer_reviews.text: within 4 months of use the heat gun developed an intermittent problem with the switch. A month later the switch will not work at all. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: doo daa man

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another.
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with this heat gun after a year of sporadic use. It works as it should every time it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: MClean

customer_reviews.title: If you need aheat gun, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable unit, solid built and worth every penny. I use it for vinyl on vehicles and the temperature control is awesome! Best heat gun I have used and I use many. It been running daily for hours on end for months, with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ElectroGeek

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works perfect, has stand for cool down and it is stable
customer_reviews.author: Adam Capo

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used this about 10x already to heat shrink some computer cables. I like the digital display and the fact that it has variable temperature speed that I can adjust to. Gotta love the kick stand to put on the floor during usage. The cable is long enough. This is my first heat gun so I can't make comparison with the weight of the unit, but it's not too heavy in my opinion. Overall, I'm happy with it. I also like the fact that it has a 3 years warranty from manufacturer. The only improvement that I would like to see is having the digital display light up and a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: MayBee

customer_reviews.title: Great heat gun
customer_reviews.text: Best one on the market, in my opinion. It's nice to have fine-grained control over the temperature. Build quality is obviously very good. I'll be surprised if I ever need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Starin

customer_reviews.title: Great gun-wish it had a case
customer_reviews.text: Works greats. Adjustable temperature and good air flow. Used it to repair cell phones, attach shrink wraps, and remove glue. Would like a case, but have to get one myself.
customer_reviews.author: BlackCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Good heat gun for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good heat gun for the money, good temp control, kickstand on the handle is an excellent feature. I use man different heat guns commercially and have already recommended this to other commercial users as a good value.
customer_reviews.author: SignsEHT

customer_reviews.title: fan broke right away
customer_reviews.text: Stoped working within the first 10 mins of turning on fan went completely dead. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Evin

customer_reviews.title: Was inoperable
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box, lcd display was blank. Fan ran but heat was not produced. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: S W

customer_reviews.title: The first one we order stopped working after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one we order stopped working after a few usages. The second one we have had since February 2017 has stopped working, The screen no long come on, so you are unable to control the heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: gayle

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised and seems to have the same DeWalt quality my other DeWalt tools have and I have used many of them without any issues. Love the temp display and the built in stand.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Curry

customer_reviews.title: excellent tools
customer_reviews.text: excellent tools, very precise and varied, high quality, professional results Fields definitely tools.
customer_reviews.author: aviquez

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heat gun for any application I use to work one prototype automotive interiors and have worked with several different heat guns over the years the Dewalt is my hand down favorite to date
customer_reviews.author: Vallee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great price for Dewalt. I have only used it for heat shrink tubing so far but it worked very well. Stores okay in the cardboard box it came it but as usual I wish it came with a dedicated storage case.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Never used, stopped working within hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in 2013. Never used until now. The fan stopped working after 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: YunYun

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the dual flow setting and digital temp setting. Has worked well shrinking heat wrap. Attachments are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Heat Gun with Control
customer_reviews.text: The adjustments of the blower speed and the toggle to a specific temperature are great features. Used on heat shrink and some plumbing fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: J. Galford

customer_reviews.title: armed and dangerous...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband as a gift. He absolutely loves it. after our puppy decided to eat the entry way floor, it was used to remove the flooring, He said it was great !!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Heat Gun ROCKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can set the heat level on this gun to precisely where it needs to be for the job at hand. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great heat gun
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have used it quite a few times already and am very satisfied with it's performance
customer_reviews.author: Christine Leazer

customer_reviews.title: Heat Gun does the job on PVC
customer_reviews.text: Remove plastic surgerical wrap from window glass in PVC frame was easy with digitally controlled heat setting that keep heat in a area of safe heat to not melt PVC frame.
customer_reviews.author: DAVY JONES

customer_reviews.title: Great heat gun
customer_reviews.text: This is the best heat gun I have ever used. Precise temp control. I would buy it again if this one would fail. It hasn't under heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: wyleone

customer_reviews.title: Best I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Use for removing decals and shrink wrap for battery cables. Best I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tybas85

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Item seems well built and designed nicely. Haven't used it a bunch but seems to take some electricity to run it also. I can see the lights flicker when it is on hi.
customer_reviews.author: greg anderson

customer_reviews.title: !!!!Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good ergonomics. The LCD is nice addition to the gun. I think this should be a must have in every tool box.
customer_reviews.author: DEN

customer_reviews.title: Heat gun for aviation ECS
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great buy, I would highly recommend to anyone considering. Temp changes with ease, while it display what the temp is as it increases to your desired temp. Leg stands work great so I don't have to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: David Muir

customer_reviews.title: Variable heat a plus
customer_reviews.text: Only used once and am satisfied it works as advertized. The variable heat is a real plus as compared to a one with a high or low setting. This one works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eldon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice heat gun
customer_reviews.text: Basically a big beefed up blow dryer, but done in typical Dewalt form. The gun itself is well made and if you own any other Dewalt tools the build quality will feel the same. The temp adjust via lcd is nice (wasn't much more then the non-lcd version)and allows for more precise adjustment (50 degrees at a time), and the unit seems quite capable. I have used it for small around the home projects and in that role it has worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dead after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work after not even 4 weeks of use. Stopped in the middle of a job. Thought if I payed for the more expensive one it would last
customer_reviews.author: Hisham Aboneaaj

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The gun works very well and I really like the digital display. It heats up fast and has done all the jobs that I bought it for.....pre-heating glass and metal, stripping labels, paint, and varnish.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and made.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent heat gun. Well made, feels good in the hand and is also stable when set upright on a bench. I love the digital precision heat settings and love that it remember what temperature I set it at last time I used it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: metallurgynerd

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt D26960 LCD Heat gun
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this heat gun a couple of times but I love the two speed blower and the adjustable heat range. To adjust the heat range just push the up button or the down button and it changes the temperature fifty degrees real simple to do. This helps eliminate the chance of burning something that you just want to warm. I think this this is going to be great to defrost a freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Tuffy46

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's Dewalt. You can't ask for a better brand. Easy to use and LCD is very clear. Very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Zetto_Oki

customer_reviews.title: MFG WAS EXACTLY RIGHT ON THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GOOD TOOL. IT DID EXACTLY WHAT THE MFG STATED IT WOULD DO.
customer_reviews.author: TOM PREECE

customer_reviews.title: Decent tool
customer_reviews.text: My gun maxes out at 750 degrees and not the 1100 as advertised, but that is fine with me because I'm using it to strip lead paint and wanted the lower temps to make sure I wasn't releasing lead vapors. The bottom line is that it works, but its not a miracle worker. You still need to scrape, but you get a feel for the technique quickly (mine scrapes easy before it bubbles). I debated on getting the "Silent Paint Remover" , but the $400 price was too risky with the stories I read about the bulbs going out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Saal

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt heat gun
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. like the heat adjustments. came with nozzles for different uses and is rugged enough for construction site .
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Hovasse

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: It has a great price for all of the features, that is why I usually choose Dewalt for my tool collection.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cave

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in November and it blew up this march. This heat gun has never worked right would not recommend it to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: Terry Thomson

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT D26960 LCD Heat Gun
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Used it to fix a PS3 YLOD. Not many other heat guns in this price range have a decent temp. setting mode. This one can set the temp in 50 degree increments, which is quite useful for working on the CPU/GPU in my case. Would definitely recommend for small hobby or computer/soldering use.
customer_reviews.author: Blacktop

customer_reviews.title: Finally a real heat gun!
customer_reviews.text: been shopping around for a good quality heat gun that would meet my needs. I'm a small buisness owner of a auto detailing salon an we install window tint an vinyl wraps. So far this heat gun I purchase from amazon has meet my expectations on all levels. I liked the heat gun so much I bought another one just like it. My advise to you get the D26960 with LCD cause it comes in handy to adjusting the right temp when needed.
customer_reviews.author: odicar

customer_reviews.title: Nifty !
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, heats up quick and is comfortable to work with. The display is a great perk and being able to stand it up makes the need for a third hand no more !
customer_reviews.author: Don A

customer_reviews.title: Good Price for hot air
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt makes alot of great tools, as with the Dewalt D26960 Heat gun. Excellent gun and for the right price. If your looking for a great hot air gun for a good price this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: ESU 2842

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it for anyone that needs to set and hold ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed heat gun. I would recommend it for anyone that needs to set and hold a specific temperature. The LCD display and controls are easy to use and see when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt D26960 LCD Heat Gun
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews regarding heat guns and I didn't want to take a chance buying a cheap one. This model worth every single penny I spent on it:-)
customer_reviews.author: ZELMAT

customer_reviews.title: exelente
customer_reviews.text: Very useful of verda enough presiso has helped me enough in my repairs I recommend it. Thank you happy day
customer_reviews.author: Jean carlos Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Heat Gun for the Pro's
customer_reviews.text: An easy to use and very effective gun. The nice thing about it is that this gun cannot kill anyone.
customer_reviews.author: paparon3

customer_reviews.title: just not sure
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. Easy to handle,comfortable. Heat controll with lcd display is great. It just seems that it does not put out a large volume of air even on the high setting but this is my first heat gun. Purchased it to use to remove vinyl decals from an rv. Could be 5 star if its air volume output is standard for a heat gun. I'm just not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Martin H JacobyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not for "food" heating, etc.
customer_reviews.text: The heating unit in this gun is metal supported on ceramic spacers. Metal ions can be released causing health hazards if ingested. This type of gun is not recommended for heating food (like toasting meringue or melting cheese) or for phyto-inhalation (vaporization) of herbals. Get the Milwaukee unit. It costs double but is accurate w/i 10 deg and has a ceramic encapsulated heating element. Good construction too, made in Romania. LOL Had to send Dewalt one back. Had to go to product website to get the heating element type too. Not listed anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: P. Turick

product_meta.title: DEWALT Heat Gun with LCD Display (D26960)
product_meta.description:
Compact and lightweight heat gun with a large temperature range to 1100°F. Heat setting is controlled in 50° increments and viewed on and LCD display (Model D26960). Built-in overload protection prevents element burn ups. Built-in hang ring for convenient storage. Includes: Heat Gun; Fishtail surface nozzle; Cone nozzle. Features: Cord protector with hook loop and jerk protector prevents the cord from tearing away from the housing Built-in innovative kickstand support provides greater stability and prevents tip over Ergonomic comfort grip provides greater comfort for extended periods of use Lightweight and compact design weighs only 2.3lbs., reducing user fatigue Specifications: Watts: 1550W Voltage: 120V Amps: 13A Temperature: 150° to 1100° F (D26960); 120°to 1100° F (D26950) Max CFM: 17.7 (D26960); 16 (D26950) Power Cord: 10'

AMAZON.COM
Compact and lightweight with a large temperature range, the DEWALT D26960 LCD Heat Gun is designed for powerful, safe operation in a variety of applications. This tool features an LCD display that controls the heat setting and makes for easy adjustments, so you'll achieve precise results. For added convenience, it comes with a built-in kickstand.

 

LCD Display for Fast, East Temperature Adjustments
The DEWALT D26960 LCD Heat Gun features a unique LCD display that lets you adjust the temperature within 50-degree increments, so you can easily match the correct temperature to the job at hand.Built-in overload protection shuts the heating element down and prevents burn up for safety and longer tool life. For additional safety, a cord protector prevents the cord from tearing away from the cord housing.

 Lightweight for Easy, Comfortable Handling
Weighing in at just 2.3 pounds, the D26960 is easy to handle and hold, reducing wrist and hand fatigue, even during all-day jobs. An ergonomic, comfort grip provides extended support, and helps keep you going longer.

Built-In Features for Storage and Stability
In addition, the D26960 has a built-in hang ring for easy storage, and a built-in kickstand for greater stability and prevents tip over.

 Warranty Information
The DEWALT D26960 LCD Heat Gun is backed by a limited three-year warranty, 90-day money-back guarantee, and one-year free service contract.

 What's in the Box
LCD heat gun with built-in kickstand, cone nozzle, fishtail surface nozzle, and manual.
feature_bullets: LCD Display allows user to adjust temperature within 50 degree increments
Built-in overload protection shuts the heating element down and prevents burn up
Built-in hang ring adds a convenient storage feature
Cord Protector keeps the cord from tearing away from the housing
Built-in innovative kickstand support provides greater stability and prevents tip over Ergonomic comfort grip provides greater comfort for long hours of use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
